argument.name: ID
argument.desc: Process ID and language file numeration

line.comment: * Only works if bonus pack is installed
* Add to your translate xml file entries \033Y and \033X and change page and id
* Reset value to stop running script
* Wait for stop previous running instance
* Search in file until next entry not found

sval.val: Process ID and language file numeration
Only works if bonus pack is installed
Add to your translate xml file entries \033Y and \033X and change page and id
Reset value to stop running script
Wait for stop previous running instance
Search in file until next entry not found
